data.text: @rgiangiorgi Hi Robin, we've replied to your DM. Thank you
@Alison37957316 Hi, your complaint is still under analysis but we've reinforced the situation. You'll receive a reply by email as briefly as possible. Thank you
@SarahFraserEN2 Hi! We deeply regret the situation reported. If we can still assist you, please DM us your booking information. Thank you in advance.
@stormtheperson Hi Storm, we're sorry for the delay with your complaint, however, it will be replied to as soon as possible. Thank you
@VeronicaG_V Hola Verónica, hemos contestado su DM.

@Chris51330717 Hello Chris, 
In order to assist you, please provide us the booking reference and/or the ticket number.  
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.
@vinholland Como indicado, pedimos que aguarde. Logo que tenhamos alguma informação adicional, retomaremos o contacto. Obrigada
@BelenLeytont Hola! Hemos contestado a su mensaje directo. Lamentamos la demora. Gracias.
@letej_ Hola Jesulete, lamentamos el retraso en su reclamación, hemos reforzado la información y le pedimos por favor que aguarde por una respuesta vía email. Gracias
@audthinking1 Hi! To better assist you, please DM us the booking numbers. Thank you in advance.
@CarinciSandrine Hi Sandrine, please accept our apologies for the delay with your complaint. We've reinforced the situation, so we kindly ask you to wait for our reply by email. Thank you

@1alst Bonsoir Yasli,
En raison d'un grand nombre de messages, le délai de réponse est actuellement long. Nous tenons à vous présenter nos excuses pour ce désagrément. Nous répondrons à votre message privé dès que possible. Merci pour votre compréhension.

@vinholland Olá Vinholland,
Lamentamos a questão que nos reporta por esta via. Vamos verificar a questão e daremos feedback com a maior brevidade possível. Obrigada
@AmsDarian Hi Darian, your complaint is still under analysis and it will be replied to as briefly as possible. Thank you
@KChadron Hi Kim, we verify that your complaint is still under analysis so you must wait for a reply by email. Thank you

@berenicefanfan @Maya32762888 Bonsoir Ngafi,
En raison d'un grand nombre de messages, le délai de réponse est actuellement long. Nous tenons à vous présenter nos excuses pour ce désagrément. Nous répondrons à votre message privé dès que possible. Merci pour votre compréhension.
@CatarinaRivera Hi Catarina, can you please tell us the booking reference or ticket number? We suggest the details through a private message due to confidentiality reasons. Thank you.
@tati_lemming Hi Tatiana, can you please tell us the booking reference or ticket number? We suggest the details through a private message due to confidentiality reasons. Thank you.

@Mariannyyy__ Hello Marianny,
 We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. We will answer to your private message as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding
@WikiBlue Hi Maria, can you please tell us the booking reference or ticket number? We suggest the details through a private message due to confidentiality reasons. Thank you.

@Christi65885485 Hi! We inform you that the correct link to submit a complaint on our website is https://t.co/bwFSKNdpJ7. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text: @Christi65885485 Hi! We deeply regret the situation. We have replied to your DM. Thank you in advance.
@AntoninoNapoli Hi Antonino, can you please tell us the booking reference or ticket number? We suggest the details through a private message due to confidentiality reasons. Thank you.
@KainovYaroslav Hi Yaroslav, your refund will be made as briefly as possible. However, it's not possible to provide you with a refund date. Thank you

@henriquelp Olá Henrique, lamentamos imenso a situação e todos os constrangimentos causados. De forma a verificar o sucedido, pedimos que nos envie um print screen do constrangimento. Por razões de segurança, solicitamos que nos envie a informação por mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@FargeGreg Hello, how can we help you? For security reasons, we kindly request you to send us your question via private message. Thank you.

data.text: @GiftyM6 Hello Gifty, we are deeply sorry for the situation and all constraints caused. In order to verify the status of your luggage, please provide us with the Property Irregularity Report (PIR). For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.

A entrada em funcionamento do novo sistema de gestão de tráfego aéreo da NAV pode impactar alguns voos no Aeroporto de Lisboa - especial incidência até 24 de outubro. Sugerimos aos nossos passageiros que monitorizem o estado do seu voo em https://t.co/R9d8RcMf3o ou na App da TAP. https://t.co/WEr7BCZpfs

urls.title: Flight information | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: See all TAP flight arrivals and departures. You can search by flight number, airport or destination and get complete information about the flight.

data.text: The entry into operation of the new NAV air traffic management system may impact some flights at Lisbon Airport, especially until the 24th of October. We suggest that our passengers monitor their flight status on https://t.co/R9d8RcMf3o or on TAP's App. https://t.co/mgze2QCmXy

urls.title: Flight information | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: See all TAP flight arrivals and departures. You can search by flight number, airport or destination and get complete information about the flight.

data.text: @gerritbus Hello gerritbus, we apologize for the situation. In order to verify the status of your file, please provide us with your file number and email associated. For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.

@Maya32762888 Bonjour Maya, nous nous excusons pour la situation et toutes les contraintes causées. Si nous pouvons vous aider, veuillez nous indiquer, par message privé, le code de votre réservation ou le numéro du billet électronique. Merci.
@IGV_SANDOVAL Lamentamos mucho que su experiencia con nosotros no haya sido positiva. Esperamos poder asistirle mejor en el futuro.(2/2)

@IGV_SANDOVAL Hola Ignacio,
Lamentamos la situación reportada así como las molestias ocasionadas. En ocasiones, por razones operativas, es necesario administrar mejor ciertos horarios y equipos para garantizar una mayor eficiencia de nuestra parte. (1/2)

@ChrisDelValle19 Hola Chris,
Pedimos disculpas por las molestias ocasionadas.
Para que sea posible verificar, le pedimos que nos indique su código de reserva. 
Por razones de confidencialidad, le sugerimos que envíe esta información a través de DM.
Gracias.
@wwwdotbtsdotcom Hello q?, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

@MajorPayne15 Hello,
We answered per DM.

@Nemi71892308 Hello Nemi,
Please provide us with your booking reference and/or electronic ticket number, so we may verify this situation.
For confidentiality reasons we suggest that you do so per private message.
Thank you.
@iamarthurrieger Olá Arthur, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@iamarthurrieger Olá Arthur,

como podemos ajudar?

@Ouissalista Hello Ouissal, 
To verify the situation, please confirm us the claim reference number and the e-mail address associated to it.
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.  
Thank you.
@coinedname Hello Francisco, can you please provide us the booking reference? For security reasons, we suggest you do so by private message. Thank you.
@KChadron Hello Kim, we have answered your private message. Thank you.

data.text: @RoystonRedmond Hello Redmond, we have answered your private message. Thank you.

@icylikeice Hello Mika, 
To verify the situation, please confirm us the claim reference number and the e-mail address associated to it.
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.  
Thank you.
@horvat_ursa Hello Urša, we have answered your private message. Thank you.
@MexOar Hello OAR, can you please provide us the refund request / complaint number? For security reasons, we suggest you do so by private message. Thank you.
@KevinRagan12 Hello Kevin, we have answered your private message. Thank you.
@Albuquick Olá Filipe, qual o código de reserva ou número de bilhete eletrónico? Sugerimos os dados por mensagem privada por razões de confidencialidade. Obrigado.
@el_yisus21 Hola Jesus, ¿puede indicarnos el número de reclamación, por favor? Por razones de seguridad, le sugerimos que lo haga por mensaje privado. Gracias.

@MariaLFGL Hello Maria,
We have just replied to your recent DM.
@vq9vbj9cb2 Hello Rafiu, we have answered your private message. Thank you.
@Samira_L Olá Samira, pode indicar-nos o número de passageiro frequente Miles&Go, por favor? Por questões de segurança, sugerimos que nos envie os dados por mensagem privada. Obrigada.

@Annaconceiicao Anna, já respondemos às suas questões.
Obrigada.
@unenanadupays Bonjour Nana, nous nous excusons pour ce délai et vous informons que nous avons transmise la situation, vous serez contactée par courriel, dès que possible. Merci.

@jcsamuelian @TAP_Portugal Hello Jean-Charles, we are deeply sorry for the situation and all constraints caused. In case we can be of assistance, please provide us, via private message, with your booking reference or the electronic ticket number. Thank you.

@MariaLFGL Hello Maria,
We have just replied to your DM.

urls.title: Hand baggage allowed on the aircraft
urls.description: Find out all about hand baggage on board TAP aircraft: what weight and sizes are allowed and what you can carry in the cabin.

data.text: @PedrodaCruzMai1 Hello Pedro, we inform you that, if you reach the boarding gate with cabin baggage that exceeds the allowed weight, size or number, it will be carried as checked luggage and a fee will be applied. (I/II)
@berenicefanfan Bonjour Ngafi, nous avons répondu a votre message. Merci.

@ChuseZgZ Hello Chuse,
May you please let us know your email address via private message?
@adri_wv Hello 🌹@adri_wv, we apologize for the delay and inform you that we have replied via private message. Thank you.

@MaevaGaye Bonjour Adja, nous nous excusons pour la situation. Si nous pouvons vous aider, nous vous prion de bien vouloir nous indiquer, par message privé, le rapport d'irrégularité de propriété (PIR). Merci.
@Annaconceiicao Olá Anna, pedimos desculpa pela demora e informamos que respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada.
@andrecstbrnc Olá André, pedimos desculpa pela demora e informamos que respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada.
@GloriaOforiwa @TAP_Portugal Hello Gloria, we apologize for the delay and inform you that we have replied to your private messages. Thank you.

@BlakewellMorgan Morgan,
We have replied to your private message and reiterated the information already provided. Thank you

@GloriaOforiwa @TAP_Portugal Hi Gloria, please accept our sincere apologies for the situation and all the distress caused by it. Can you please tell us your booking reference or ticket number through DM? Thank you

@MileideMiloca Camiula,
Vamos verificar a sua questão e responderemos à sua mensagem privada com a maior brevidade possível. Obrigada
@BlakewellMorgan Morgan, we're sorry but we reiterate our previous information, you must contact the travel agency directly. Thank you
@MileideMiloca Olá Camiula, como podemos ajudar por esta via? Obrigado

@JoaoCoriel @PNSpedronuno Olá João, verificamos que o voo irá sair de Lisboa com um atraso de 1h15, lamentamos todos os transtornos causados por esta situação, contudo a mesma deve-se a problemas operacionais. Obrigado
@carogermanetti Hi Carolina, can you please tell us the booking reference or ticket number? We suggest the details through a private message due to confidentiality reasons. Thank you.
@payno1978 Hello Tim, we replied by private message. Thank you.
@sparklygemster Hello Gemma, can you please provide us the booking reference? Thank you.
@l_khami Olá LK, não temos indicação da sua DM. Pode enviar novamente por favor?

@kawaldhelm Este código (PIR) contem as 3 letras referentes ao aeroporto de chegada, seguido de TP e números posteriormente (exemplo: LISTP12345). . Por questões de segurança e proteção dos seus dados, solicitamos que efetue o envio dos mesmos através de uma mensagem privada. Obrigada (3/3)
@kawaldhelm Para que nos seja possível verificar a sua questão, solicitamos que nos indique o número do processo de irregularidade referente à sua bagagem. (2/3)

@kawaldhelm Olá Ka,
Lamentamos a demora na nossa resposta. Devido ao elevado número de mensagens recebidas não nos foi possível responder de forma mais célere. (1/3)

@carlosjbaute Hola Carlos,

la oficina en Caracas sería en el aeropuerto en días de vuelos TAP. Podrá también hacer la reserva a través de la nuestra página web https://t.co/fJblNXx7rh . Gracias.

urls.title: FlyTAP – TAP's official website
urls.description: TAP Air Portugal welcomes you on board! Explore our destinations, search for the cheapest flights and learn all about check-in, on-board meals and TAP Miles&Go miles Programme. Book now!

data.text:
@BlakewellMorgan Morga,
We have already replied to your messages. Please contact your travel agency. Thank you
@VodkaPaf Hello Black, did you receive a booking reference? If so, we suggest that you provide us that information by private message. Thank you.

@BlakewellMorgan Morgan,
We will only be able to provide the required assistance once you send us the requested details through a private message. Thank you
@Guill_Alb Hi Guillaume, do you have a complaint number? Can you please tell us the number through DM? Thank you
@MrNunoCarvalho Olá Nuno, a sua DM será verificada assim que possível. Obrigado
@jmxhg @SilvaMarhuanta Hi, your DM will be verified as soon as possible. Thank you
@SilvaMarhuanta Por nada, gracias por su contacto. ✈️
@SilvaMarhuanta No Antonio, tiene de verificar con las autoridades responsables del país directamente, no con TAP. Gracias
@SilvaMarhuanta Hola Antonio, para verificar las condiciones de entrada en los países tiene de hablar con las autoridades responsables de entrada. Gracias.
